trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies how data fields are displayed and formatted by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx XXX.XXX Xxxxxxx Xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if the formatting string applies to the field value in edit mode; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if empty string values are automatically converted to null; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the display format for the field value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the field should be HTML-encoded.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx XXXX$xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the field should be HTML-encoded; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx XXXX$xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the text that is displayed for a field when the field's value is null.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx x xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx$x xxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
